passive.name: DREAM-LADEN BOUGH
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DREAM-LADEN BOUGH
                                Lillia's abilities apply Dream Dust, dealing 6% max Health magic damage (6% + 0.012% ) over 3 seconds. Lillia restores 20 Health (20  + 6% ) over the duration against large jungle monsters, and restores 10 Health (10  + 15% ) against champions.Dream Dust's damage is capped at 60 () damage over the duration against jungle monsters.Dream Dust heals is 33% effective for each source beyond the first.Dream Dust can only heal from one monster at a time.
notes: duration against large jungle monsters, and restores 10 Health (10  + 15% ) against champions

q.name: (Q) BLOOMING BLOWS
q.description:
(Q) BLOOMING BLOWS
 5.5/5/4.5/4s   65 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Lillia's Ability hits grant 4.5% (4.5/5.5/6.5/7.5 + 2% ) Move Speed for 6 seconds, staking up to 4 times.Active: Lillia whirls her censer, dealing 35 magic damage (35/55/75/95 + 40% ), plus an additional 35 true damage (35/55/75/95 + 40% ) at the outer edge.Blooming Blows deals 110% damage to monsters.

w.name: (W) WATCH OUT! EEP!
w.description:
(W) WATCH OUT! EEP!
 14/13/12/11s   65 
                                
                                
                                Lillia winds up a huge strike, dealing 70 magic damage (70/110/150/190 + 35% ). Enemies in the center take 140 magic damage (140/220/300/380 + 70% ) instead.Deals 50% damage to minions.

e.name: (E) SWIRLSEED
e.description:
(E) SWIRLSEED
 15s   70 
                                
                                
                                Lillia lobs a swirlseed overhead, dealing 70 magic damage (70/105/140/175 + 45% ) where it lands and revealing Slowing them by 40% for 3 seconds. If no enemies are hit, the deed rolls until it hits an enemy or collides with terrain.

r.name: (R) LILTING LULLABY
r.description:
(R) LILTING LULLABY
 100/85/70s   50 
                                
                                
                                Lillia causes all enemy champion with Dream Dust  to become Drowsy for 1.5 seconds. Afterward, they fall Asleep for 2/2.3/2.5 sesonds.When awakened by damage, they take an additional 100 magic damage (100/150/200 + 40% ).Drowsy units are slowed over the duration, and fall Asleep afterwards.Asleep units can't move or act until damaged by an enemy with non-periodic damage.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
situational_items_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.
